summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Ashworth Avenue, Densmore Avenue and Wallingford Avenue, each from West Green Lake Way, to North 80th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7654 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by OAecial assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
